Package controller

Class CustomerScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that controls the logic of the customer screen to display the list of customer stored in the database.

FUTURE ENHANCEMENT

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

      public void deleteCustomerClickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
